data.author: Frank Prins

changelog.release_notes: I was getting tired of the always visible date and other info after a single tap. Changed this in a timer behaviour: after a tap it will now show the other info for 2 seconds, and return back to the time view.

data.description:
A first playing around face, inspired by Unix interfacing. It is quite like the other you will find around here, named Terminal etc.
Oh, and yes, I am aware the unix commands shown are not valid, but at least they have something to do with the stuff they show :-)
At the moment, it will show time, and after shaking, date, battery level and bluetooth status. I might change the way this works in the near future.

In case of questions and/or suggestions, do not hesitate to mail!

Enjoy, Frank

latest_release.release_notes: I was getting tired of the always visible date and other info after a single tap. Changed this in a timer behaviour: after a tap it will now show the other info for 2 seconds, and return back to the time view.

data.title: Unix style
